content: परिपा {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> To drink; उपनिषदः परिपीताः <ls>Bv. 2. 40.</ls> {vII.v} {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To protect, preserve, guard, defend against; <ls>Y. 1. 335</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 251.</ls> {@--2@} To rule, govern; <ls>Māl. 10. 25.</ls> {@--3@} To bring up, nourish, support. {@--4@} To keep to, observe, adhere to, persevere in; अंगीकृतं सुकृतिनः परिपालयति <ls>Ch. P. 50.</ls> {@--5@} To wait for, await; अथ मदनवधूरुपप्लवांतं व्यसनकृशा परिपालयांबभूव <ls>Ku. 4. 46.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To protect {@--2@} To keep, maintain. {@--3@} To wait for, expect.
